item.title: Dad fail. It would have been epic running the @lamarathon with him, but I guess we will wait 2 more years. Seems most marathons the age limit is 18. Who knew. Obviously not me. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #marathontraining #dadfail
item.description: Dad fail. It would have been epic running the @lamarathon with him, but I guess we will wait 2 more years. Seems most marathons the age limit is 18. Who knew. Obviously not me. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #marathontraining #dadfail

item.title: Run through Redlands 1/2 marathon Sunday's forecast: - Wet shoes - Soaked everything - My son questioning his life choices - Me pretending I had no idea First rainy race memories coming up! Sometimes the best race stories come from the worst conditions.

item.title: I lost 18 pounds and took 650,000 steps. Rookie numbers I know. Thanks for following along. I know it's long but I have a no part 2 policy. Now to get ready for my next race in 3 weeks, Cocodona 250 miler. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #ArizonaMonster

item.title: The hand shake finalized it. When Hayden committed to his first marathon last October, he could barely run 2 miles. This weekend, he tackles 26.2 at SLC Marathon. The transformation has been remarkable. Hundreds of training miles later, this young Type 1

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
